description: The Roy Huckleberry Memorial Scholarship is open to a declared Accounting major who has completed at least 12 hours at the time of application and has a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA, as well as a minimum 3.25 major GPA in Accounting. Eligibility Requirements Declared Accounting major Completed a minimum of 12 hours Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Minimum major GPA of 3.25

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major is Accounting   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Accounting   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Accounting

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
